info.game_comments:
Last game of Season 31.
Alex Trebek's audio was re-recorded when his voice recovered.

double_jeopardy_round: OLD TV SHOWS BY EPISODE TITLE

(2, 4).clue: To decrease gradually in intensity, such as the moon in passing from full to new
